General.Name: eCloudvalley Digital Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: eCloudvalley Digital Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the information service and storage commodity trading businesses worldwide. The company offers cloud migration, data analytic and AI enablement, serverless, cloud security, content delivery network, and managed services, as well as services related to development and operations. It also provides cloud based digital transformation and SAP solutions; and containerization, an operating system virtualization technology that offers a lightweight virtual environment for various computing resources. In addition, the company operates Atlas, a Cloud Management Platform that enhance streamline and automates clients cloud operations. It serves public sectors; banks; and media, gaming, and travel industries, as well as startups. eCloudvalley Digital Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2013 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 111-32, Sanhe Rd., New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24152
